title: Hydroponics Growing System, 12 Pods Hydroponics Growing System Indoor Garden with LED Grow Light, Height Adjustable Indoor Gardening System, Hydroponic Growing System Built-in Timer Function
descriptions:
**Hydroponics Growing System, 12 Pods Indoor Garden with LED Grow Light**

Grow your favorite plants year-round with our 12 Pods Hydroponics Growing System. This indoor garden is perfect for gardening enthusiasts, urban dwellers, and anyone looking to bring some greenery into their home. With its advanced features and self-sufficient design, this system makes it easy to grow a variety of plants, from leafy greens to herbs and flowers.

**Key Features:**

* **LED Grow Light:** Our system features a 25W SMD LED grow light with full-spectrum technology, providing 30% more luminous flux than traditional lights and accelerating plant growth by 5x.
* **Advanced Deep Flow Water Circulation System:** This system ensures that your plants receive the right amount of water and nutrients, with a cycle of every 30 minutes and a low noise level.
* **4L Water Tank:** With a capacity of 4L, this tank provides self-sufficient growth for up to 18 days and features a water level gauge for easy monitoring.
* **Adjustable Height:** The system's extendable rod allows for adjustable height up to 17.78 inches, supporting various plant types and sizes.
* **Package Includes:** Hydroponics system, plant food A and B, 12 planting hats, 12 planting baskets, 12 biochar mud, adapter, and manual.

**What You'll Receive:**

* 1 x Hydroponics Growing System
* 1 x Plant Food A and B
* 12 x Planting Hats
* 12 x Planting Baskets
* 12 x Biochar Mud
* 1 x Adapter
* 1 x Manual

**Warranty and Support:**

* 360-day warranty period
* Available after-sales service for any questions or concerns

**Order Now and Start Growing Your Favorite Plants Today!**

**Shipping:** [Insert shipping information here]

**Buy with Confidence:** Our hydroponics growing system is designed to provide you with a fun and easy way to grow your favorite plants. With its advanced features and self-sufficient design, you'll be enjoying fresh, homegrown produce in no time. Order now and start growing today!
